plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm smaller than a tree.
💧 I drink water from the ground.
🪴 You might have me in a pot.

plant.question: I am red and round, and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a common vegetable.
🥪 People often put me on sandwiches.
☀️ I love growing in the sun.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, with many branches and leaves. Birds build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm much bigger than a flower.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when heated. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a yellow plant.
🔥 I need heat to become what you eat.
🍿 People like to put butter on me.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun throughout the day. My seeds are good to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name tells you where I look.
🌞 I always turn towards the sun.
⚫ My seeds are small and black.

plant.question: I am a green plant that can be spicy or mild. I am often used to flavor tacos. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 Some people think I make food taste better
🌮 I go well with lots of different meats.
🇲🇽 I'm used in Mexican cooking

plant.question: I am a fruit with a thick yellow peel. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm a long, curved fruit.
🐒 You peel me before you eat me.
💪 Eating me gives you potassium which is great for muscles!

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground. I can be mashed, fried, or baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I'm a brown lump before you cook me.
🍟 You can make french fries from me.
🌍 I grow well almost everywhere on the planet.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that grows in the desert. I can store water for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have needles instead of leaves.
🏜️ I'm very good at surviving in dry places.
💧 I store a lot of water inside me.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with reddish bark. I am one of the largest and oldest living things on Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I'm much bigger than a regular tree.
🕰️ Some of my family members have been alive for thousands of years.
🔴 My bark is reddish-brown.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite food of primates
💛 My color is often associated with happiness
🍴 You don't need a spoon or fork to eat me

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often poured into a glass
🐄 I am a product of farm animals
🍪 I am delicious with baked goods

food.question: I am round and red, green, or yellow. I grow on trees and you can eat me raw. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I keep the doctor away
🌳 I grow in an orchard
🥧 You can bake me into a pie

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
🐇 Bugs Bunny enjoys me
👀 I am good for your eyesight

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I come in slices
🥪 You can put yummy fillings between me
🔥 I am baked in an oven

food.question: I am sweet and frozen. I come in many flavors and people scream for me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a cold treat
🌈 I can have many colors and tastes
☀️ I am perfect for a hot day

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. You can make juice or jelly with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on a vine
🍷 I can be used to make a grown-up drink
🥜 Sometimes you can find me in peanut butter

food.question: I am made from potatoes. I am long and crispy and often served with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am a popular side dish
🧂 I taste great with salt
🥔 I start as a root vegetable

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten for breakfast. I can be cooked in milk or water. Goldilocks loved me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I'm a warm, comforting meal
🐻 I'm part of a famous fairy tale
🌾 I come from a plant in a field

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am a healthy green option
🌳 My florets look like small trees
🧀 I am delicious with cheese sauce
